name: Ch14ABaseConvo5
_source: speak;Tana;Look at how vast it is, Vanessa!|The desert stretches as far as the eye can see!
speak;Vanessa;It is quite the sight, Princess Tana.|I've never seen anything like it in Frelia.
speak;Tana;Oh, please just call me Tana!|We're friends, aren't we?
speak;Vanessa;Of course... Tana.|It's still taking some getting used to.
speak;Tana;Isn't it amazing how our pegasi can fly over such harsh terrain?|From up here, the desert almost looks like an ocean of sand!
speak;Vanessa;The view is certainly beautiful.|Though I must admit, I worry about how the heat affects our mounts.
speak;Tana;Oh! You're right.|I should have thought of that.|Do you think we should land and give them a rest?
speak;Vanessa;That would be wise.|I can see an oasis not far from here.|It would provide shade and water for them.
speak;Vanessa;Princess—I mean, Tana!|We shouldn't strain our pegasi unnecessarily...
speak;Tana;I'm just teasing!|Let's glide down gently.
speak;Tana;Wow!|The oasis is so much more beautiful up close!|Look at how blue the water is against all this sand!
speak;Vanessa;It is quite remarkable.|Nature finds a way to create beauty even in the harshest conditions.
speak;Tana;Just like people, wouldn't you say?|Some of the kindest souls come from the toughest circumstances.
speak;Vanessa;That's... quite insightful, Tana.|I hadn't thought of it that way.
speak;Tana;My brother always says I notice the strangest things.|But I think it's important to find meaning in what we see.
speak;Vanessa;I agree.|It's what makes you a good pegasus knight.|You observe details others might miss.
speak;Tana;Vanessa!|That might be the nicest thing you've ever said to me!
speak;Vanessa;I-I merely stated the truth.|You have natural talent as a flier.
speak;Tana;That means so much coming from you!|You're the best knight in all of Frelia!
speak;Vanessa;I wouldn't go that far...|But thank you.
speak;Tana;Oh! Look at those desert flowers!|I didn't know plants could bloom in such heat!
speak;Vanessa;Desert flora is remarkably resilient.|Those likely only bloom after the rare rainfall.
speak;Tana;We should pick some to bring back!|Wouldn't they make lovely decorations for the camp?
speak;Vanessa;I'm not sure we should disturb them...|They're rare and likely important to the desert ecosystem.
speak;Tana;You're right again.|We can just enjoy their beauty while we're here.
speak;Vanessa;We could sketch them if you'd like.|I always carry a small journal for mapping terrain.
speak;Tana;That's a wonderful idea!|I didn't know you could draw, Vanessa!
speak;Vanessa;It's nothing artistic.|Just basic field sketches for military reports.
speak;Tana;I'd still love to see!|Maybe you could teach me?
speak;Vanessa;I'd be happy to.|Though I warn you, I'm a strict teacher.
speak;Tana;I wouldn't expect anything less!|Oh, Vanessa, I'm so glad we got to do this together.|Seeing new places is so much better with a friend.
speak;Vanessa;I feel the same way...|Thank you for insisting I join you today.
speak;Tana;Always!|Now, let's get those sketches done before we head back!
speak;Vanessa;Yes, we shouldn't linger too long.|The others will be expecting us back soon.
speak;Tana;Just a little longer...|I want to remember this moment with my friend...
